title: Trends in Community Bank Performance over the Past 20 Years
content: - 12 -   enlightening.  In addition, I hope that some of the conversations here today among   researchers, bankers, and bank regulators will continue, leading to benefits to all in the   form of more informative research, better design and implementation of regulatory   policy, and enhanced community bank performance.
